column4: After a restart my bash history in a GNOME terminal prints some entries in the format  cd "`echo -e '\0057home\0057detlef\0057gnome\0057gnome\0055volume\0055manager\0055\0062\0056\0062\0062\0056\0061'`" instead of the format 'cd /home/detlef/gnome/gnome-volume-manager-2.22.1'. Is this a bug or a feature?
